tool_description: Creates prepaid shipping labels for return packages with tracking capabilities and carrier selection.

return_authorization_number.description: Valid return authorization number from approved return request

customer_address.description: Full customer shipping address for pickup/drop-off

preferred_carrier.description: Shipping carrier: ups, fedex, usps, dhl

error_messages: Invalid return authorization: Authorization number not found or expired.
Invalid address format: Customer address must include street, city, state, and postal code.
Weight limit exceeded: Package weight must be between 0.1 and 150 pounds.
Unsupported carrier: Must be one of [ups, fedex, usps, dhl].
Carrier service unavailable: Selected carrier does not service the customer address.
usage: Input valid return_authorization_number, complete customer_address, and package_weight. Optionally specify preferred_carrier. Tool generates prepaid shipping label with tracking.

shipping_label_url.description: URL to download the printable shipping label

tracking_number.description: Package tracking number for shipment monitoring

estimated_delivery_date.description: Expected arrival date at return center
